about_the_game:
Portal BAGLEY is a fan-made, free modification for Portal 2 which plays in an unknown time period.


  • Steam Achievements!
  • An estimated gameplay time of ~04-08 hours* (May change)
  • Custom Story with almost 600* separate in-game voicelines (May change)
  • Over an hour of custom music with the free soundtrack included
  • Huge amount of custom assets
  • Standalone mod (You do not need Portal 2 installed to play)
  • Free to Play (You must own Portal 2)
  • Logic based puzzles


Set in an unknown time period, Portal: BAGLEY tells a new story using new characters including the test subject, you!
You play as a test subject who is awakened by a scientist named Bagley. Bagley wants to help you escape the facility... But what will you discover?

IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT THE DEVELOPERS

Since the development team is only composed of one person two persons, the development is more or less long, so I want to apologize if the game comes out in more or less time. But I prefer to release the game in a long time with an irreproachable development rather than now with a game full of various and varied bugs.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 13 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.6.7 or higher
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
